TopicTitle: My solar panels won't deploy! Help.

Articles.Content: I am trying to deploy my solar panels, I started having issues since 1.4.0 and still have the problem. I right click on them and nothing happens. Please help me since nobody answered me so far..

Hi there!  Looks like a couple of people did reply to your original question-- best to continue the discussion there on the thread you already have, rather than spin up a new one. 

I also note that your original question was just a few days ago.  Please be patient.  If you've got a question, by all means ask it here!  But once it's been asked, please don't try to "bump" it or open up duplicate threads, since if everyone did that the forums would get very hard to read.
